Verses: 1 ivaiyellaam Mudindhapinbu, Vandhirundha Isravelar Ellaarum Yoodhaavin Pattanangalukkup Purappattuppoi, Yoodhaa Benyameen Engum Eppiraayeemilum Manaaseyilunkooda Undaana Silaigalai Udaiththu, Vikkiragath Thoppugalai Vetti, Medaigalaiyum Peedangalaiyum Idiththu, Avaigalaiyellaam Thagarththuppottaargal; Pinbu Isravelpuththirar Ellaarum Avaravar Thangal Oorgalilirukkira Thangal Kaaniyaatchikkuth Thirumbinaargal.

2 esekkiyaa Aasaariyar Leviyarudaiya Vaguppugalai Avargal Varisaigalinpadiyeyum Avaravarai Avargal Oozhiyaththinpadiyeyum Thittappaduththi, Aasaariyaraiyum Leviyaraiyum, Sarvaangathaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Seluththavum, Karththarudaiya Paalayaththin Vaasalgalil Oozhiyancheydhu Thudhiththu Sthoththirikkavum Ozhunguppaduththinaan.

3 raajaa Karththarudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Andhisandhigalil Seluththavendiya Sarvaangathaganapaligalukkum, Oivunaatkalilum Maadhappirappugalilum Pandigaigalilum Seluththavendiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalukkum Than Aasthiyilirundheduththuth Than Pangaik Koduththaan.
4 aasaariyarum Leviyarum Karththarudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththai Urchaagamaaik Kaikkollumpadi Avargalukkuriya Paagaththaik Kodukka Janangalukkum Erusalemin Kudigalukkum Kattalaiyittaan.

5 indha Vaarththai Prasiththamaanapodhu, Isravel Puththirar Dhaaniyaththilum, Dhraatcharasaththilum, Enneyilum, Thenilum, Nilaththin Ellaa Varaththilum Mudharpalangalai Thiralaagakkonduvandhu, Sagalaththilum Dhasamapaagaththaip Paripooranamaaik Koduththaargal.

6 yoodhaavin Pattanangalil Kudiyirundha Isravel Puththirarum, Yoodhaapuththirarum, Maadugalilum Aadugalilum Dhasamapaagaththaiyum, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Parisuththampannappattavaigalil Dhasamapaagaththaiyum Konduvandhu Kuviyal Kuviyalaaga Vaiththaargal.
7 moondraam Maadhaththil Kuviyal Seyyaththodangi Ezhaam Maadhaththil Mudiththaargal.
8 esekkiyaavum Prabukkalum Vandhu, Andhak Kuviyalgalaik Kaanumpodhu, Karththarukku Sthoththirancheluththi, Avarudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelaip Pugazhndhaargal.
9 andhak Kuviyalgalaik Kuriththu Esekkiyaa Aasaariyaraiyum Leviyaraiyum Visaariththapodhu,

10 saadhokkin Sandhadhiyaanaagiya Asariyaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyan Avanai Nokki: Indhak Kaanikkaiyaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkuk Konduvarath Thodanginadhumudhal Naangal Saappittuth Thirupthiyadaindhom; Innum Michchamum Irukkiradhu; Karththar Thammudaiya Janaththai Aaseervadhiththadhinaal Indhath Thiratchiyaana Ambaaram Meendhirukkiradhu Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Pandagasaalaigalai Aayaththappaduththa Sonnaan.

12 avargal Avaigalai Aayaththappaduththinapinbu, Avaigalile Kaanikkaigalaiyum, Dhasama Paagaththaiyum, Parisuththampannappattavaigalaiyum Unmaiyaai Eduththuvaiththaargal; Avaigalinmel Leviyanaagiya Konaniyaa Thalaivanum, Avan Thambiyaagiya Simeyi Irandaavadhumaayirundhaan.

13 raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavum, Dhevanudaiya Aalaya Visaaranaikkaaranaagiya Asariyaavum Pannina Kattalaiyinpadiye, Yegiyelum, Agasiyaavum, Naagaaththum, Aasagelum, Yerimoththum, Yosabaaththum, Eliyelum, Ismagiyaavum, Maagaaththum, Penaayaavum, Konaniyaavin Keezhum Avan Thambiyaagiya Simeyiyin Keezhum Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal.

14 kizhakku Vaasalaik Kaakkira Imnaavin Kumaaranaagiya Kore Ennum Leviyan, Karththarukku Seluththappatta Kaanikkaigalaiyum Magaa Parisuththamaanavaigalaiyum Pangidumpadikku, Dhevanukku Seluththum Urchaagak Kaanikkaigalmel Adhigaariyaayirundhaan.

15 avanudaiya Kaikku Udhaviyaaga Aasaariyarin Pattanangalil Vaguppugalinpadiyirukkira Thangal Sagodhararile Periyavanukkum Siriyavanukkum Sarisamaanamaaik Kodukkumpadikku, Unmaiyullavargalaaga Ennappatta Edhenum, Minyameenum, Yesuvaavum, Semaayaavum, Amariyaavum, Sekkaniyaavum Erpaduththappattaargal.

16 vamsa Attavanaigalil Ezhudhappatta Moondru Vayadhumudhal, Adharku Merpatta Aanpillaigalaith Thavira, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkul Pravesikkira Avaravarukkum Thangal Vaguppugalinpadiye, Thangal Muraigalile Thaangal Seygira Thangal Panividaikkuththakkadhaai Anudhina Padi Kodukkappattadhu.
17 thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsa Attavanaigalil Ezhudhappatta Thangal Vaguppugalinpadiye Thangal Muraigalilirukkira Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal, Adharku Merpatta Aasaariyarukkum, Leviyarukkum,

18 avargaludaiya Ellaak Koottaththin Attavanaiyilum Ezhudhappatta Avargaludaiya Ellaak Kuzhandhaigalukkum, Manaivigalukkum, Kumaararukkum, Kumaaraththigalukkum Pangu Koduththaargal; Avargal Parisuththamaanadhai Unmaiyinpadi Parisuththamaai Visaariththaargal.

19 aasaariyaril Ellaa Aanpillaigalukkum Leviyarukkulle Attavanaiyil Ezhudhappattavargal Ellaarukkum Padikodukka, Aasaariyarudaiya Ovvoru Pattanaththukkaduththa Velinilangalilum Aaron Puththiraril Perperaagak Kurikkappatta Manushar Irundhaargal.
20 indhappragaaramaaga Esekkiyaa Yoodhaavengum Nadappiththu, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Nanmaiyum Semmaiyum Unmaiyumaanadhai Seydhaan.

21 avan Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththinvelaiyilum, Than Dhevanaith Thedumpadikku Nyaayappramaanaththirkum Karpanaikkum Aduththa Kaariyaththilum Ennaseyyath Thodanginaano, Adhaiyellaam Than Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Seydhu Siththipetraan.
